issues.description: Compaction test results (97.3%) below required 98% for Level 1 supervision
Insufficient cover depth (280mm) for drainage pipes under traffic areas (minimum 300mm required)
High rainfall in last 7 days (45mm) requires additional moisture content monitoring

recommendations.action: Increase drainage pipe cover depth to minimum 300mm
Re-compact and retest earthworks to achieve 98% MDD
Implement additional moisture content monitoring program

analysis: Project has significant compliance issues requiring immediate attention. Major non-compliances identified in earthworks compaction (97.3% vs required 98%) and drainage cover depths (280mm vs required 300mm). Weather conditions are manageable but require monitoring. Council approval timelines present significant risk with average processing times of 259 days versus 40-day statutory target. Estimated total financial impact of $145,000 including remediation, penalties, and delay costs. Critical path will be affected with estimated 15-day delay. Immediate action required on drainage cover depths and earthworks compaction to avoid further delays and cost escalation.
